encyclopedia.title: Vlieg
encyclopedia.fact: A small insect often found near food.

encyclopedia.title: Stokgogga
encyclopedia.fact: Mimics twigs to hide from predators.

encyclopedia.title: Kakkerlak
encyclopedia.fact: Tough insect that can live almost anywhere.

encyclopedia.title: Lieweheersbesie
encyclopedia.fact: Spotted beetle that eats garden pests.

encyclopedia.title: Naaldekoker
encyclopedia.fact: Swift flyer that hunts near water.

encyclopedia.title: Vuurvliegie
encyclopedia.fact: Glows at night using natural light.

encyclopedia.title: Hottentotsgot
encyclopedia.fact: Predator that folds its long front legs.
